title: CREATE collection command to have parameter for turning on/off data driven nature
description: Once SOLR-10574 is implemented, it would be good to have a CREATE collection parameter to turn on/off the data-driven nature.

comments.content:
SolrCLI.java already has a ConfigTool and a method

protected void setCollectionConfigProperty(String solrUrl, String collectionName, String propName, String propValue)


So this should be quite easy to script, e.g.

bin/solr create -c foo -dynamic false
comments.author: Jan Høydahl
